Name: Eternal Cave Escape
About the game: You find yourself stuck in a cave with nothing but your wit... and a pickaxe! As you climb your way out you'll find this is no ordinary cave. Features A precision platformer designed for you to play at your own pace. Fully connected map with no checkpoints. All progress made can be lost! - A slightly different take on what has been coined the 'rage game' genre. - Choose from a selection of playable characters, with more you can unlock! Gameplay The controls are simple: You can move, jump, and use your pickaxe, that's it! Master your movement to tackle all obstacles on your climb out of the cave.
